sql: CREATE USER reader REQUIRE ISSUER '/CN=Owner CA' SUBJECT '/CN=Reader'
CREATE USER writer REQUIRE ISSUER '/CN=Owner CA' SUBJECT '/CN=Writer'
CREATE USER owner REQUIRE ISSUER '/CN=Owner CA' SUBJECT '/CN=Owner'
GRANT SELECT ON test.data TO reader
GRANT INSERT ON test.data TO writer
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON test.data TO owner
